verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Rescue the perishing,
care for the dying;

Jesus is merciful,
Jesus will save.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Rescue the perishing,
care for the dying,

snatch them in pity
from sin and the grave;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Weep o'er the erring one,
Lift up the fallen,

Tell them of Jesus
the mighty to save.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Waiting the penitent child
to receive;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Plead with them earnestly,
Plead with them gently,

He will forgive
if they only believe.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Down in the human heart,
crushed by the tempter,

Feelings lie buried
that grace can restore;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Touched by a loving heart,
wakened by kindness,
Chords that are broken will vibrate once more.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Rescue the perishing,
duty demands it;

Strength for thy labor
the Lord will provide;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Back to the narrow way
patiently win them;

Tell the poor wanderer
a Savior has died.
